title: The one thing necessary Preached in a sermon at Pauls, before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor, and the aldermen of the City of London, Aug. 31. 1656. By Thomas Watson, minister of Stephens Walbrook, London.
author: Watson, Thomas, d. 1686.
publisher: printed by E.M. for Ralph Smith, at the Bible in Cornhil, neer the Royal Exchange; and Thomas Parkhurst, at the three Crowns at the lower end of Cheap-side against the Conduit,
notes: Copy tightly bound with slight loss of print; some print show-through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
